original: J'ai reconnu son visage.
translated: I recognized his face.

original: Tom se débrouille bien.
translated: Tom is managing all right.

original: Je suis consciente des faits.
translated: I'm aware of the facts.

original: Vous n'allez pas vous faire arrêter ou quelque chose comme ça !
translated: It's not like you're going to get arrested or anything.

original: Je veux savoir de qui il s'agit.
translated: I want to know who that is.

original: Je viens d’arriver à la station.
translated: I've just arrived at the station.

original: Je n'ai pas joué au badminton depuis le lycée.
translated: I haven't played badminton since high school.

original: Les équations sont la partie ennuyeuse des mathématiques. J’essaye de voir les choses en termes de géométrie.
translated: Equations are just the boring part of mathematics. I attempt to see things in terms of geometry.

original: Tom a été expulsé du terrain pour avoir eu un comportement anti-sportif.
translated: Tom was sent off the pitch for unsportsmanlike behaviour.

original: Je ne veux pas que vous fassiez cela.
translated: I don't want you to do that.

original: J'aimerais te rappeler que tu es sous serment.
translated: I'd like to remind you that you're under oath.

original: La prochaine fois, vous ne serez pas aussi chanceuses.
translated: Next time, you won't be so lucky.

original: Je ferai tout ce qu'il faut.
translated: I'll do whatever it takes.

original: Donne-moi quelques jours pour le reconsidérer.
translated: Give me another couple of days to think it over.

original: Je ne le rencontre presque jamais.
translated: I hardly ever run into him.

original: Je me suis blessé.
translated: I got hurt.

original: As-tu une déficience mentale ?
translated: Are you mentally challenged?

original: Il était le seul à ne pas s'en apercevoir.
translated: He was the only one who didn't realize it.

original: Ne lis pas en marchant.
translated: Do not read while walking.

original: C'était une maison de fous !
translated: It was a madhouse!

original: Quand je suis entré dans la pièce, elle jouait du piano.
translated: Entering the room, I found her playing the piano.

original: Je fus contraint de prendre des médicaments.
translated: I was forced to take medicine.

original: Tu sais tout ceci.
translated: You know all that.

original: Il s'est éloigné de son père.
translated: He went away from his father.

original: Tom nagea avec les lamantins.
translated: Tom swam with the manatees.

original: Sortez du parking ou j'appelle la police pour vous.
translated: Get out of the parking lot or I'll call the police for you.

original: Je ne peux rien te promettre.
translated: I can't promise you anything.

original: Veux-tu du café ?
translated: Do you want coffee?

original: Que dites-vous d'y aller ?
translated: What do you say we go there?

original: La mélancolie engendre des délires.
translated: Melancholy is the nurse of frenzy.

original: Je n'ai pas pensé que vous étiez chez vous.
translated: I didn't think you were home.

original: Les tire-laines ciblent les touristes.
translated: Pickpockets target tourists.

original: À qui est ce crayon ?
translated: Whose pencil is this?

original: Il me faut y aller.
translated: I have to go.

original: La foreuse du rover a pénétré la surface martienne rouge.
translated: The drill from the rover penetrated the red Martian surface.

original: Il ne vit plus ici.
translated: He no longer lives here.

original: Savez-vous parler anglais ?
translated: Do you speak English?

original: Tu ne peux pas retirer ce que tu as dit.
translated: You cannot take back what you have said.

original: Ma petite sœur n'a pas dit bonjour.
translated: My younger sister didn't say "hello."

original: Plus j'y réfléchis, moins je le comprends.
translated: The more I think about it, the less I understand it.

original: Tu ne sais pas ce que c'est, n'est-ce pas ?
translated: You don't know what this is, do you?

original: Je n'ai rien flairé.
translated: I had no doubts.

original: Elles se sont accoutumées au froid.
translated: They got used to the cold.

original: Marie a acheté à Tom une copie de « Comment se faire des amis » de Dale Carnegie.
translated: Mary bought Tom a copy of "How to Win Friends and Influence People", by Dale Carnegie.

original: Tom ne sait pas quelle couleur choisir.
translated: Tom does not know which colour to choose.

original: Elle chanta doucement.
translated: She sang softly.

original: La vie est difficile.
translated: Life is difficult.

original: Ils vont au concert.
translated: They're going to the concert.

original: Je suis désolé, nous n'acceptons pas les chèques.
translated: I'm sorry, we don't accept checks.

original: Son fils aîné n'est pas marié.
translated: His oldest son is not married.

original: Prends ma main.
translated: Take my hand.

original: J'ai crocheté la serrure.
translated: I picked the lock.

original: C'est une bonne question !
translated: It is a good question.

original: Attendez ici jusqu'à ce que je revienne !
translated: Wait here until I get back.

original: Je veux que vous me preniez avec vous.
translated: I want you to take me with you.

original: Je pense que vous avez l'air excitants.
translated: I think you look hot.

original: J'espère que vous passez tous du bon temps.
translated: I hope you're all having a good time.

original: Je suis un coureur.
translated: I am a runner.

original: Il est peu probable que Tom gagne.
translated: It's unlikely Tom will win.

original: Ne disons à personne que nous sommes mariés.
translated: Let's not tell anybody that we're married.

original: Sami sentait qu'il ne maîtrisait plus sa vie.
translated: Sami felt like he had lost control over his life.

original: L'as-tu mis quelque part ?
translated: Did you put it somewhere?

original: Essaie.
translated: Try some.

original: Ce n'est pas sain pour vous.
translated: It's not healthy for you.

original: Tu as oublié d'arroser les plantes !
translated: You forgot to water the plants!

original: Je dispose d'encore beaucoup de temps pour m'amuser.
translated: I still have a lot of time for fun.

original: Ils mangent beaucoup de riz.
translated: They eat a lot of rice.

original: Je suis plus intelligente que vous.
translated: I'm smarter than you are.
